resources.string: The Buffer Logic Gate is used to increase a weak signal in a circit design. The buffer preforms the same task as two inverters or Not Gates.
The Not Gate, or Inverter, swtiches the input signal from high to low, or low to high.
The And Gate checks whether both signal inputs are high. The output signal will only be high if all of the inputs are high, otherwise the output signal will be low.
The Nand Gate is an And Gate with a inverter. This gate will return a high signal as long as the input signals are not both high.
The OR Gate will produce a high output singal, as long as the input signals are not both low.
The NOR Gate is an OR Gate with an inverter and will only produce a high output if both input signals are low.
The XOR Gate checks whether the input signals are the same. If they are the same the output signal is high, otherwise the output will be low.
The XNOR Gate is a XOR gate with an inverter, returning a high output singal when the input signals are different.
